#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<vector>
#include<functional>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,check,x,t,a,b,i=0;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	priority_queue<int ,vector<int>,greater<int> > q;
	priority_queue<int ,vector<int>,less<int>  > p;
	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&check);
		if(check==1)
		{
			scanf("%d",&x);
			i++;
			q.push(x);
			a=q.top();
			if(p.size()==0)
			{
				b=0;
			}
			else
			{
				b=p.top();
			}
			if(b>a)
			{
				p.pop();
				p.push(a);
				q.pop();
				q.push(b);
			}
			if(i/3 <q.size())
			{
				p.push(q.top());
				q.pop();
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if(i/3==0)
			{
				printf("No reviews yet\n");
			}
			else
			{
				printf("%d\n",q.top());
			}
		}
	}
}
